response.overview: A guy loves a girl since from his childhood however, every time whenever he tries to propose that girl disappears. One fine day accidentally these two and another 3 people happen to get locked in an Apartment. So from there some comedy and emotional love story will drive the story till the end. Finally, everyone get to know that lock up was not accidental that was a planned move by Heroâ€™s best friend to make Hero win his love.
response.title: Alaa Aa Roju
